00009 #ifndef STXXL_CONTAINERS_BTREE__BTREE_PAGER_H
00010 #define STXXL_CONTAINERS_BTREE__BTREE_PAGER_H
00011 
00012 #include <memory>
00013 #include <list>
00014 
00015 #include "stxxl/bits/common/utils.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00019 
00020 namespace btree
00021 {
00022     class lru_pager
00023     {
00024         unsigned_type npages_;
00025         typedef std::list<int_type> list_type;
00026 
00027         std::auto_ptr<list_type> history;
00028         std::vector<list_type::iterator> history_entry;
00029 
00030 
00031         lru_pager(const lru_pager & obj);
00032         lru_pager & operator = (const lru_pager & obj);
00033     public:
00034 
00035         lru_pager() : npages_(0), history(NULL)
00036         { }
00037 
00038         lru_pager(unsigned_type npages) :
00039             npages_(npages),
00040             history(new list_type),
00041             history_entry(npages_)
00042         {
00043             for (unsigned_type i = 0; i < npages_; i++)
00044             {
00045                 history_entry[i] = history->insert(history->end(), static_cast<int_type>(i));
00046             }
00047         }
00048         ~lru_pager() { }
00049         int_type kick()
00050         {
00051             return history->back();
00052         }
00053         void hit(int_type ipage)
00054         {
00055             assert(ipage < int_type(npages_));
00056             assert(ipage >= 0);
00057             history->splice(history->begin(), *history, history_entry[ipage]);
00058         }
00059         void swap(lru_pager & obj)
00060         {
00061             std::swap(npages_, obj.npages_);
00062             // workaround for buggy GCC 3.4 STL
00063             //std::swap(history,obj.history);
00064             std::auto_ptr<list_type> tmp = obj.history;
00065             obj.history = history;
00066             history = tmp;
00067             std::swap(history_entry, obj.history_entry);
00068         }
00069     };
00070 }
00071 
00072 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE
00073 
00074 
00075 namespace std
00076 {
00077     inline void swap(      stxxl::btree::lru_pager & a,
00078                            stxxl::btree::lru_pager & b)
00079     {
00080         a.swap(b);
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 #endif /* STXXL_CONTAINERS_BTREE__BTREE_PAGER_H */
